attributes.action: Who would police the police? Complaints procedure against the police should involve an element of lay members from the very beginning
attributes.additional_details: Complaints against the police are investigated by the police themselves, unless they involved very serious incidences (like death) whereby Police Complaints Authority becomes involved. A small group of armed police force tended form a clique & support each other. There are incidences whereby a police officer shot a suspect dead a suspect carrying a table leg without warning because they thought he was carrying a shotgun, shot dead Menezes in a crowed tube as they thought he was a suicide bomber, an OAP, a barrister, a driver whilst attempting to stop him on a routine check. What about the police shooting dead a suspect in Ipswich about over 2 years ago? Where are the outcomes of the investigations by Police Complaints Authority? Suspects should not be shot dead without warning. Challenging armed suspects to surrender should be done in a more secluded place & when armed surveillance police officers are in a strategic safe spot away from crowded places.
